name: Psi-Hulk
feats: Great Fortitude, Greater Psionic Fist, Multiattack, Psionic Fist, Psionic Meditation, Skill Focus (Concentration), Toughness

moves.name: Confusing Gaze
moves.desc: Confusion as the spell, 30 feet, caster level 12th, Will DC 16 negates.

moves.name: Psionic Lion’s Charge
moves.desc: The psi-hulk spends its 3 remaining power points to activate this ability. When the ability is activated, the creature gains the powerful charge of a lion. When it charges, it can make a full attack in the same round.
